00666 /*@=exportlocal@*/
00669 /*@unused@*/ static inline int xislower(int c) /*@*/ {
00670     return (c >= 'a' && c <= 'z');
00671 }
00672 /*@unused@*/ static inline int xisupper(int c) /*@*/ {
00673     return (c >= 'A' && c <= 'Z');
00674 }
00675 /*@unused@*/ static inline int xisalpha(int c) /*@*/ {
00676     return (xislower(c) || xisupper(c));
00677 }
00678 /*@unused@*/ static inline int xisdigit(int c) /*@*/ {
00679     return (c >= '0' && c <= '9');
00680 }
00681 /*@unused@*/ static inline int xisalnum(int c) /*@*/ {
00682     return (xisalpha(c) || xisdigit(c));
00683 }
00684 /*@unused@*/ static inline int xisblank(int c) /*@*/ {
00685     return (c == ' ' || c == '\t');
00686 }
00687 /*@unused@*/ static inline int xisspace(int c) /*@*/ {
00688     return (xisblank(c) || c == '\n' || c == '\r' || c == '\f' || c == '\v');
00689 }
00690 
00691 /*@unused@*/ static inline int xtolower(int c) /*@*/ {
00692     return ((xisupper(c)) ? (c | ('a' - 'A')) : c);
00693 }
00694 /*@unused@*/ static inline int xtoupper(int c) /*@*/ {
00695     return ((xislower(c)) ? (c & ~('a' - 'A')) : c);
00696 }

00701 int xstrcasecmp(const char * s1, const char * s2)               /*@*/;
00702 
00706 int xstrncasecmp(const char *s1, const char * s2, size_t n)     /*@*/;
